data.eml:eml: Revision of the Hoplodrina implacata group (Lepidoptera: Noctuidae: Noctuinae: Caradrinini) of Taiwan, with descriptions of four new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wu, Shipher, Owada, Mamoru (2018): Revision of the Hoplodrina implacata group (Lepidoptera: Noctuidae: Noctuinae: Caradrinini) of Taiwan, with descriptions of four new species. Zootaxa 4455 (3): 571-581, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4455.3.13
